title: Your Current Situation
description: Help us understand where you are right now in your journey

questions.question: What best describes your current situation?

options.label: High school student - Planning for university or career
Recent graduate - Just finished studies (within last year)
Job searching - Actively looking for opportunities
Considering career change - Exploring new directions
Taking a break - Gap year or between opportunities

questions.question: If you're currently studying or working, in what field or subject?
questions.placeholder: e.g., Business, Marketing, International Relations, Engineering, Undecided...

questions.question: How much professional work experience do you have (internships, part-time, full-time)?
What's your primary goal for taking this career assessment?
questions.placeholder: e.g., 'I want to understand what careers might suit my personality' or 'I'm trying to choose a university major' or 'I want to validate my current career path'...

questions.question: Which of these do you currently have or have access to? (Select all that apply)

options.label: Professional network or connections in a field
Portfolio of work or completed projects
None of these yet - I'm just starting out

questions.question: How urgent is making a career decision for you?

options.label: Very urgent - I need to decide within 1-3 months
Somewhat urgent - within 6 months to 1 year
Exploring - I have 1-2 years to decide
Not urgent - just curious and exploring options

questions.question: If you have any career ideas or roles in mind (even vague ones), what are they?
questions.placeholder: e.g., 'Something with helping people', 'Working internationally', 'Creative work', 'NGO or social impact', 'Marketing or communications'...

questions.question: How much time can you dedicate to career exploration and skill development?

options.label: Full-time - This is my main focus right now
Limited time - A few hours when I can

questions.question: What are your biggest worries or concerns about your career future?
questions.placeholder: Be honest - what keeps you up at night when you think about your future career?

questions.question: How confident do you feel about your career direction right now?
questions.minLabel: Very uncertain - I have no idea what I want to do
questions.maxLabel: Very confident - I have a clear career direction
